title: [PS3.x] Introduce adaptive-force cutoff for far-field optimization
body: Add adaptive cutoff radii for gravity calculations to reduce pairwise computation load.

title: [PS3.x] Multi-force engine architecture
body: Design a unified engine where gravity, drag, EM forces, noise, and user-defined forces can register at runtime.

title: [PS3.x] Add continuous constraint projection for complex surfaces
body: Extend constraint projection beyond sphere/torus to arbitrary surfaces and curved manifolds.

title: [PS3.x] Add symplectic integrator variants
body: Implement third- and fourth-order symplectic integrators (Ruth, Yoshida) for long-term stability.

title: [PS3.x] Add rotating reference frame physics
body: Simulate dynamics in rotating frames with Coriolis and centrifugal effects.

title: [PS3.x] Add relativistic toy-model corrections
body: Introduce simplified special-relativistic corrections to force and velocity calculations.

title: [PS3.x] Unified force registry
body: Create a registration system for custom force models and force composition.

title: [PS3.x] Simulation determinism pass
body: Guarantee deterministic results under fixed seeds, ordering, and JAX semantics.

title: [PS4.x] Scalar field simulation engine
body: Add scalar field substrate solver with tunable boundary conditions and coupling to particles.

title: [PS4.x] Fluid substrate solver
body: Implement simplified Navier–Stokes-like dynamics (2D/3D) for substrate simulations.

title: [PS4.x] Particle–field coupling
body: Allow particles to modify scalar fields and vice versa, simulating mediated dynamics.

title: [PS4.x] Substrate-driven curvature model
body: Allow substrate density or field magnitude to modify effective topology curvature.

title: [PS4.x] Substrate energy exchange model
body: Introduce energy transfer between particles and substrate field.

title: [PS4.x] GPU acceleration for scalar fields
body: Accelerate field evolution using JAX-CUDA or custom GPU kernels.

title: [Engine3.x] GPU-accelerated solver pass
body: Implement full GPU pipeline for force computation and integration using JAX/Numba/CUDA.

title: [Engine3.x] KD-tree neighbor search
body: Implement KD-tree data structures for high-dimensional neighbor queries.

title: [Engine3.x] Barnes–Hut treecode
body: Add O(N log N) approximation method for large-N gravitational simulations.

title: [Engine3.x] Octree neighbor engine
body: Introduce octree-based neighbor partitioning for 3D physics acceleration.

title: [Engine3.x] Unified neighbor engine abstraction
body: Create a single interface for hash-grid, KD-tree, octree, and BH modules.

title: [Engine3.x] Integrator plugin system
body: Support dynamic integrator selection and runtime loading.

title: [Engine3.x] Multistep integrator family
body: Add Gear predictor–corrector and Adams–Bashforth integrators.

title: [Topology3.x] Higher-genus surface topology
body: Add genus ≥2 surfaces with correct displacement paths and boundary rules.

title: [Topology3.x] Projective plane topology
body: Implement non-orientable projective plane topology and coordinate transformations.

title: [Topology3.x] Time-varying topology transitions
body: Allow topology to morph during simulation with smooth invariants.

title: [Topology3.x] General geodesic solver
body: Add numerical geodesic solver for arbitrary input surfaces.

title: [Topology3.x] Topology-aware rendering pipeline
body: Add rendering modes representing topology curvature and embedding in viewers.

title: [Diagnostics2.x] Stability classification engine
body: Classify simulation stability by analyzing drift, jitter, divergences, and periodicity.

title: [Diagnostics2.x] Drift heatmap visualization
body: Visualize spatial distributions of stability drift.

title: [Diagnostics2.x] Real-time anomaly flagging
body: Flag anomalies such as unbounded acceleration or sudden reversals.

title: [Diagnostics3.x] AI-assisted anomaly detection
body: Integrate LLM reasoning to detect unphysical patterns and emergent anomalies.

title: [Diagnostics3.x] Simulation QA scoring system
body: Score runs for physical correctness and numerical stability.

title: [Diagnostics3.x] Multi-run regression harness
body: Automate comparisons across simulation versions for reproducibility.

title: [PSS3.x] Scenario template system
body: Create reusable YAML-based scenario templates for consistent configuration.

title: [PSS3.x] Parameter dependency graph solver
body: Compute dependency constraints among parameters before simulation.

title: [PSS3.x] Pre-run configuration constraint solver
body: Detect invalid configurations before runtime based on dependencies.

title: [PSS3.x] PSS plugin system
body: Enable scenario modules to plug custom parameters and validation rules.

title: [Viz3.x] Shader-based particle rendering
body: Use WebGL shaders for high-performance point rendering and lighting.

title: [Viz3.x] 4D projection renderer
body: Render 3D motion using time as a visualization dimension.

title: [Viz3.x] Multi-pane comparison dashboard
body: Display synchronized views for topology, integrator, or parameter comparison.

title: [Viz3.x] Real-time raymarcher for topology rendering
body: Use raymarching to visualize curved manifolds interactively.

title: [Edu2.x] Advanced topology curriculum
body: Educational content demonstrating advanced topologies and transitions.

title: [Edu2.x] Chaos demonstration portal
body: Interactive modules showing chaos, bifurcations, and sensitivity to initial conditions.

title: [Edu2.x] Physics stabilization teaching suite
body: Educational walkthrough showing PS1.x → PS3.x improvements.

title: [Edu2.x] Intro to substrate physics module
body: Teach scalar-field and fluid-substrate dynamics in an interactive way.
